faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Common questions about the Advaita Vedanta course.

questions.question: Do I need prior knowledge of Sanskrit?
questions.answer: No prior knowledge of Sanskrit is required. All texts will be explained in English with transliterations.

questions.question: How long is the course?
questions.answer: The course is self-paced and can be completed in 4-6 weeks with regular study.

questions.question: Will I get a certificate?
questions.answer: Yes, upon successful completion of the course, you will receive a certificate of completion.
